metadata.title: Instant Ayahuasca Lightning Bolt TEK
metadata.purpose: Ayahuasca analog creation - NOT for smoking
metadata.philosophy: Traditional herbalist approach - no acids, bases, or petroleum solvents

overview.simplicity: Based in ancient herbalism and herbal extraction practices
overview.principle: Same method used for nearly every herbal medicine
overview.author_note: Best ayahuasca experience author ever had - better than jungle shaman brews

step_1_soak.action: Add ethanol to each plant material separately
step_1_soak.amount: Cover plant matter with 1 inch of ethanol above level

step_2_strain.action: Strain and separate menstruum (alkaloid-containing liquid) from plant matter
step_2_strain.terminology: Menstruum = herbalist term for tincture liquid

step_3_evaporate.action: Pour menstruum into pyrex baking pans
step_3_evaporate.result: Crystals form - hard foam crystals that rise like puffy cake

step_4_harvest.action: Scrape crystals off with razor blade
step_4_harvest.note: Crystals become slightly sticky after cooling or if pressed

methods: Dissolved in warm water (like instant coffee)
ingestion.comparison: No difference found between caps and warm water

food_interaction.suggestion: Good breakfast, light lunch, no dinner if dosing in evening
food_interaction.trigger_food: Sourdough bread 20-30 min after dosing accelerates onset

ingestion.enhancement: Author considered cacao nibs before dosing (theobromine enhances tryptamines)

onset.initial: 90 minutes - nausea felt, no effects yet
onset.after_food: 15-20 minutes after bread - came on like gangbusters
onset.total_wait: 2 hours after ingestion for full effects

quality.clarity: Crystal clear - most clear-headed aya experience ever
quality.emotional: Heart opened, light radiated between group members
quality.visual: Open and closed eye visuals, entity contact incredible
quality.educational: Most educational experience author had with aya
quality.therapeutic: Able to witness disturbing feelings without over-identifying

effects.heart_opening: Light between group members from heart
effects.entity_contact: Snake spirit taught oneness, how to alter events in reality
effects.no_intoxication: Only euphoria - no clouding of mind
effects.music_exploration: Could explore disturbing feelings while remaining clear witness

comparison_to_traditional_brews.jungle_shaman_brews: Intoxicating, cloud mind, create fear and panic, difficulty integrating
comparison_to_traditional_brews.this_tek: Clear, open, light-filled, no intoxication besides euphoria
comparison_to_traditional_brews.THH_like: Effects similar to what people describe from THH (tetrahydroharmine)

ethanol_production.option: Organic sustainable sugar for ethical production

chacruna.effects: Visionary experiences later in evening, clear open heart and head

connection_to_oilahuasca.similarity: Both achieve psychoactive effects through simple food-safe methods

harm_reduction_notes.legal_status: DMT and ayahuasca analogs are controlled in most jurisdictions
harm_reduction_notes.maoi_interaction: B. caapi contains MAOIs - dietary and drug restrictions apply
harm_reduction_notes.purpose: Historical documentation of harm reduction community research
